name: Balloon Tower Defence 3D
description:
(**Proper balance/enemy waves will be implemented soon**)

A simple 3D tower defence game inspired by the Bloons Tower Defence series by NinjaKiwi, created on Unreal Engine 4.

 -- Unique 'rogue-like'esk mods to choose from after every wave:

Thick Rubber, Thin Rubber, Pyromania, Manual Override, Premium Helium, Baby Balloons, Observer, Friendly Fire and Mobility.

 -- Towers:

Gunner, Freezer, Tack Shooter, Rocket Tower and Farm.

 -- Upgrades:

Each tower starts with a single upgrade that improves stats, but the second upgrade is a choice between two, power and crowd control. The towers' power/crowd upgrades have some interesting effects for you to discover.

More in-depth info/notes:

For controls read the controls at the top left on screen when playing.

The game currently has very few enemy waves for the 'story mode' so I would recommend playing around in the sandbox mode instead. 

Farm's power upgrade will stop giving money, but instead it will increase the speed of nearby towers by 50%. 

Only fire/explosive towers can deal damage to the metal balloons.

Every non-moab balloon can be spawned as a camo balloon, these towers will be targeted by all towers but only some towers/upgrades can deal damage to these towers. 

Moab balloon's health can be seen by hovering on them with mouse.
